project.name: Kuix
project.description:
Kuix (Kalmeo User Interface eXtensions) is an extensible and fully customizable JavaME (J2ME) UI framwork that enables high end application development.
- Wide devices compatibility
From the beginning, maximizing compatibility level has lead the development of Kuix and it results today in a wide range of supported devices. Basically, Kuix is compliant with CLDP 1.0 and MIDP 2.0.
- Fast and easy application development
Forms and widgets are organized through an XML approach that combined with CSS file, allow the programmers to build applications even faster!
